website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive ratchet load binder that is strong yet somewhat limited in its potential capacity.
pros: Easy to use and highly affordable
cons: It is lighter duty than some other options
Check to make sure its smaller size would fit your particular needs

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: I had the lever type binders but did not really like them. I purchased these and they work great. They do seem to be a little shorter than others I have seen, but the others were for bigger chain, so I don't know if that made a difference. I am using these with 5/16 inch chain and they work great. You can get your tension adjustments just like you want it with no effort. I will not go back to the lever type binders after using these. They are so much easier to get the exact tension.
customer_reviews.author: David Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great price,Great features,Great looks!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase these to use on my car hauling trailer. it makes it a lot easier to boom down a car without help. I can put one at each end of the car and tighten them up myself, did not have to take a helper along with me. These were the smaller ones, I bought the larger ones first and then the smaller ones for smaller jobs. They make the job easier.
customer_reviews.author: Alma Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Great value and work well
customer_reviews.text: I use these when I haul my BX24 Kubota tractor (with mower, FEL, and backhoe) I lubed the threads up with some never seez and they work just fine. Chains are so much better than straps and these work just fine for all the load that I'm hauling.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Quality rugged build.
customer_reviews.text: Good rugged build, good paint job, used for chain binding pallet forks on a bucket loader, works great for this and would work for many other applications also.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Kibbee

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Gave it some hard use and it held up well. Seems very well made. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Good binder.
customer_reviews.text: They work very well tying down my zero turn lawn mower on the trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Husker Fan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: miss read the size wanted a small hook with the large binder.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Never on time. This seller was.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small load binder. It is the right size for my application
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its a good light duty binder, use it to bind a mid size tractor.
customer_reviews.author: william beck

customer_reviews.title: Great value, very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for hauling my kubota BX23s. Bought 4 will buy more. Awesome mini binders
customer_reviews.author: PJ_907

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: great product. it definitely does everything I need it for. five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Nice binder seems to work fine
customer_reviews.text: Nice binder seems to work fine, $14.00 cheaper than whats in the local store too. recommend and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kickstand

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and works exactly the way it's suppose to.
customer_reviews.author: Greg, MN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lite them a lot. light and small enough and they work in small or tight quarters.
customer_reviews.author: Edward H. Boulay

product_meta.title: Elitexion Ratchet Type Chain Load Binder 1/4 - 5/16 inch (2,600 Lbs)
product_meta.description: 1/4" - 5/16" Ratchet Load Binder. Constructed of drop-forged, heat-treated carbon steel for strength and durability. Handle length approximately at 7". Ends adjust out about 4" on each side giving you 8" of width. Quick ratcheting action ensures easy binding of your load. WLL 2600LBS, MBS 7800LBS
feature_bullets: Constructed of drop-forged, heat-treated carbon steel for strength and durability.
Handle length approximately at 7". Ends adjust out about 3" on each side giving you 6" of width.
Quick ratcheting action ensures easy binding of your load.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars46 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
